JWT_EXPIRED: Kodi wohererejwe yarengeje igihe. Saba indi !
JWT_INVALID: Kodi wohererejwe ntiyemewe. Gerageza na none cyangwa usabe indi !
ROLE_CHANGE_NOT_ALLOWED: Ntiwemerewe guhindura icyo uyu munyamuryango ashinzwe!
LOGIN_TO_ACCESS: Banza winjire nk'umunyamuryango w'urubuga kugira ngo ugere ku nyandiko wifuje !
USERNAME_EMPTY: Izina ryihariye ry'ubunyamuryango ku rubuga ni ngombwa !
USERNAME_LENGTH: Izina ryihariye ry'ubunyamuryango ku rubuga ntirishobora kugira inyuguti ziri munsi ya 5 kandi ntizirenge 20 !
USERNAME_INVALID: Izina ry'ubunyamuryango ntiryemerewe kubamo ibimenyetso, rishobora kugira inyuguti n'imibare gusa!
USER_NAME_IN_USE: Iryo zina ryarafashwe, hari undi urikoresha !
EMAIL_IN_USE: Iyo email yarafashwe, hari undi uyikoresha !
PASSWORD_EMPTY: Ijambo ry'ibanga ni ngombwa, ntirishobora kuba ubusa !
PASSWORD_LENGTH: Ijambo ry'ibanga ntirishobora kugira inyuguti n'ibimenyetso biri munsi ya 8 !
PASSWORD_WEAK: Ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe riroroshye cyane, ijambo rikomeye rigomba kubamo byibura inyuguti nto, inyuguti nkuru, umubare n'ikimenyetso cyihariye!
EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD_EMPTY: Ugomba gukoresha email wibarujeho hamwe n'ijambo ry'ibanga !
EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD_INVALID: Email cyangwa ijambo ry'ibanga wibeshye harimo ikosa !
USER_NOT_FOUND: Nta munyamuryango twasanze ukoresha iyo email !
PASSWORD_RESET_TOKEN: Kodi wohererejwe kugira ngo uvugurure ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe ni :
REQUEST_IGNORE: Niba utarasabye kuvugurura ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe, ubu butumwa bwirengagize.
PASSWORD_RESET_TOKEN_INVALID: Kodi yo kuvugurura ijambo ry'ibanga siyo cyangwa yarashaje !
PASSWORD_NOT_MATCH: Ijambo ry'ibanga rya mbere rinyuranye n'irya 2!
OLD_PASSWORD_INCORRECT: Ijambo ry'ibanga rya kera ririmo ikosa !
USER_NOT_FOUND_ID: Nta munyamuryango twabonye ufite iyi kodi :
FIRSTNAME_LENGTH: Izina ry'idini ntirishobora kugira inyuguti ziri munsi y'ebyiri, kandi ntizishobora kurenga 20!
FIRSTNAME_STRING: Izina ry'idini ryandikwa mu nyuguti gusa!
LASTNAME_LENGTH: Izina bwite ntirishobora kugira inyuguti ziri munsi y'ebyiri, kandi ntizishobora kurenga 20!
LASTNAME_STRING: Izina bwite ryandikwa mu nyuguti gusa!
EMAIL_PASSWORD_RECOVERY: Reba email yakoherejwe kugira ngo ubashe kuvugurura ijambo ry'ibanga !
INVALID_DATE: Itariki ntiyemewe, itariki yemewe yandikwa mu buryo bukurikira : Ukwezi-umunsi-umwaka (urugero : 03/25/2005) !
HOBBY_LENGTH: Izina ry'umwidagaduro ntirishobora kugira inyuguti ziri munsi y'eshatu, kandi ntizarenga 20 !
HOBBY_STRING: Izina ry'umwidagaduro ntiryemera ibimenyetso, koresha inyuguti n'imibare gusa !
FAVORITE_EXISTS: Uru rusobe rw'ibyo ukunda rusanzwe ruhari !
IMAGE_EMPTY: Ntabwo wahisemo ishusho yo kohereza ku rubuga !
IMAGE_UPLOADED: Ishusho yoherejwe ku rubuga nta ngorane !
FRIEND_REQUEST_ALREADY: Uyu muntu usanzwe waramusabye kuba incuti !
FRIEND_REQUEST_NOT_FOUND: Ubucuti wasabwe ntibushoboye kuboneka kugira ngo ubwemeze !
FRIEND_ACCEPTED: Wemeje ubucuti wasabwe, ubu muri incuti !
FRIEND_REQUEST_SHOW_FAIL: Ntiwemerewe icyo gikorwa cyangwa ubusabe bw'ubucuti bwarahagaritswe !
